subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Buffalo Sabres did not retaliate after their goalie was flattened against Boston. Rules changes and stronger policing by the N.H.L. may be rewriting the sport’s code of retribution.
snippet: The Buffalo Sabres did not retaliate after their goalie was flattened against Boston. Rules changes and stronger policing by the N.H.L. may be rewriting the sport’s code of retribution.
